ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] heritrix3 jira is asking for login now
ygData.msgSnippet: I checked into it again today and it turned out that the temporary suspension had ended, but the heritrix section had apparently been left closed. I opened it

I checked into it again today and it turned out that the temporary
suspensi=
on had ended, but the heritrix section had apparently been
left closed. I o=
pened it up again to anonymous view access.

So this issue is resolved.

No=
ah


On Fri, Jul 24, 2015 at 7:19 AM, Kristinn Sigur=C3=B0sson
kristinn@lan=
dsbokasafn.is [archive-crawler]
<archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
> =
This was first reported here about three weeks ago. The response at the tim=
e (from Noah at IA) was:
>
> ---
> Earlier this week apparently there was s=
ome unusual traffic against the wiki, and anonymous access has been tempora=
rily suspended, until we and Atlassian figure out what's going on. In the m=
ean time I made a copy of the front page here: https://github.com/interneta=
rchive/heritrix3/wiki
> ---
>
> I don't know if the issue is ongoing or if =
they just forgot to re-enable anonymous access. In either case, the current=
 situation is very unfortunate.
>
> - Kris
>

>> Hello,
>>
>> I wanted to raise awareness that the w=
iki link
>> <https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix>  present in=

>> README <https://github.com/InternetArchive/heritrix3#3-getti=
ng-started>
>> is now asking for authentication into Atlassian Cloud. I sus=
pect this is not
>> what is supposed to happen, and I wanted to raise aware=
ness so we can
